title: FS/FT: T205 Gray/Stats & A. Leifield BIG PRICE CUT

posts.post_title: FS/FT: T205 Gray/Stats & A. Leifield BIG PRICE CUT
posts.post_content:
Here are a couple semi-tough T205s.  
Take either for [STRIKE]$99[/STRIKE] $79 or both for [STRIKE]$189[/STRIKE] $149.


Will also trade (either straight-up or plus cash on either side) for: N28 or N162 (baseball only); T205 in PSA 3 or better (PSA only); E92/101/102/105/106/T216/D303/Tango (Fr-VG, raw or slabbed); 1953 Bowman Color in strong EX or better; Modern BC/TC prospect or RC blue refractors of star players.

Big price cut, let's get these sold!
